医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
输血会增加自发性脑出血的风险卡罗林斯卡学院研究人员领导的《美国医学会杂志》上发表的一项重大研究表明，自发性脑出血的可能原因可能是通过输血传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Blood-transfusion-linked-to-increased-risk-of-spontaneous-brain-hemorriage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Blood-transfusion-linked-to-increased-risk-of-spontaneous-brain-hemorrhage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c304388-7031-44c5-bcf0-f93d290655c8 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 14:07:10 -0400 Blood transfusion linked to increased risk of spontaneous brain hemorrhage

微生物组组成影响军团病的严重程度肺炎是由细菌、病毒或真菌引起的肺泡感染。它是全世界发病和死亡的主要原因之一，造成临床和经济负担以及全球公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Microbiome-composition-influences-severity-of-Legionnaires-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Microbiome-composition-influences-severity-of-Legionnaires-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e74b9bfe-a6d5-41d3-9bb8-b5de5ade0362 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 13:54:09 -0400 Microbiome composition influences severity of Legionnaires' disease

让残疾人士能够接受乳腺癌筛查Lene Andersen，MSW，从小就患有类风湿性关节炎和残疾。她个人行动不便的经历以及在安大略省多伦多进行乳房X光检查所面临的挑战，促使她决心倡导变革。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Making-breast-cancer-screening-inclusive-for-disabled-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Making-breast-cancer-screening-inclusive-for-disabled-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=703c61eb-c026-4832-be6e-19ab0759a12c Wed, 13 Sep 2023 11:51:48 -0400 Making breast cancer screening inclusive for disabled individuals
AfricaBP 旨在促进生物多样性基因组学和生物信息学领域的基层知识交流自 2021 年启动以来，非洲生物基因组计划 (AfricaBP) 在实现未来 10 年内对 100,000 个非洲特有物种进行测序的宏伟目标方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AfricaBP-aims-to-foster-grassroots-knowledge-exchange-in-biodiversity-genomics-and-bioinformatics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AfricaBP-aims-to-foster-grassroots-knowledge-exchange-in-biodiversity-genomics-and-bioinformatics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84aaa838-68bd-4b2c-a7c4-55d7465a5a1e Wed, 13 Sep 2023 11:45:52 -0400 AfricaBP aims to foster grassroots knowledge exchange in biodiversity genomics and bioinformatics

为什么疾病预防控制中心向所有人推荐新的新冠加强剂一个联邦专家小组周二建议，每个 6 个月以上的人都应该接种最新的 covid-19 加强疫苗，因为他们听说普遍接种疫苗每年可以比仅老年人接种疫苗多预防 10 万人住院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Why-the-CDC-has-recommended-new-covid-boosters-for-all.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Why-the-CDC-has-recommished-new-covid-boosters-for-all.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abf494ae-68f0-4cfa-a19c-9eb565b9a2a6 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 10:44:54 -0400 Why the CDC has recommended new covid boosters for all
